original_text: And when we had sailed across the open sea along the coast of Cilicia and Pamphylia, we came to Myra in Lycia.
korean_text: 길리기아와 밤빌리아 바다를 건너 루기아의 무라 시에 이르러

sentences.original_text: And when we had sailed across the open sea
along the coast of Cilicia and Pamphylia,
we came to Myra in Lycia.
